Constructor for initializing an error message indicating that account address is used as target.

<Note>
  `AccountAddressAsTargetError` extends `PermissionBuilderError`, see the docs
  for PermissionBuilderError for all supported methods.
</Note>

## Import

```ts
import { AccountAddressAsTargetError } from "@alchemy/smart-accounts";
```

## Parameters

### permission

`Permission`
The permission with account address as target
